name: file-loader08
description: file-loader 用于处理文件 ``` javascript const path = require('path'); module.exports={     entry: './src/index.js',     output: {         filename: 'bundle.js',         path: path.resolve(__dirname,'dist')     },     module: {         rules: [             {                 test: /\.(png|svg|jpg|gif)$/,                 use: [                     'file-loader'                 ]             }         ]     } }
